prompt: Generate the text "Hello world" with world in yellow highlighting. Black text, white background. That words should be shown next to each other in the center of the screen. Animation: Let the words fade in from left to right and then highlight "world" yellow. Mimic a typewriter effect for the text appearance with a blinking cursor at the end of the text.
summary: Integrate the “Assistant Landing” grid background look and add global “animate all over the place” motion (float/tilt/scale, drifting grid, bouncy entrance) while keeping the existing typewriter behavior intact.

conversationMessages.content: Generate the text "Hello world" with world in yellow highlighting. Black text, white background. That words should be shown next to each other in the center of the screen. Animation: Let the words fade in from left to right and then highlight "world" yellow. Mimic a typewriter effect for the text appearance with a blinking cursor at the end of the text.
Add this component as mainstream and animate it all over the place

attachedComponentReferences.name: Assistant Landing

conversationMessages.content: Integrate the “Assistant Landing” grid background look and add global “animate all over the place” motion (float/tilt/scale, drifting grid, bouncy entrance) while keeping the existing typewriter behavior intact.

edits.old_string:
const cursorStyle: React.CSSProperties = {
		display: "inline-block",
		width: "0.12em",
		height: "0.95em",
		backgroundColor: "#111",
		marginLeft: "0.08em",
		transform: "translateY(0.06em)",
		opacity:
			frame < start
				? 0
				: frame >= fullDone
					? cursorOn
						? 1
						: 0
					: 1,
		transition: "opacity 100ms linear",
	};
edits.new_string:
const cursorStyle: React.CSSProperties = {
		display: "inline-block",
		width: "0.12em",
		height: "0.95em",
		backgroundColor: "rgba(235, 242, 255, 0.95)",
		marginLeft: "0.08em",
		transform: `translateY(0.06em) rotate(${Math.sin(frame / 9) * 2}deg)`,
		opacity:
			frame < start
				? 0
				: frame >= fullDone
					? cursorOn
						? 1
						: 0
					: 1,
		boxShadow: "0 0 18px rgba(110,231,255,0.25)",
		transition: "opacity 100ms linear",
	};
